title: Bug via Web Form
description:
**Bug reported via web form**

**Reporter:** Christopher Michael Dobbins

**Description:**
Error loading bugs / Failed to fetch / Retrying in 5 seconds

**Submitted:** 2025-10-29
fix_description: Fixed GitHub API rate limiting causing 500 errors. Added GitHub token authentication (increases rate limit from 60/hr to 5000/hr). Implemented 30-second cache to reduce API calls. Better error handling with detailed logging. Falls back gracefully if token not available. File: netlify/functions/get-all-bugs.js
